name: My Tray Computer
short_description:
The MTC is completely reprogrammed and written in the C# language. Therefore, you need to install "Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile" package to use this product. Now, you can customize your Programs, Games or Folders menu by creating shortcut files in the Tray Menu folder. The Tray Menu folder, like as Windows Start Menu folder, is the location to keep store any kind of shortcut files. It has three sub-folders, 1) Programs - for application shortcut files, 2) Games - for game shortcut files and 3) Folders - for path shortcut files; to categorize.

There are two types of Tray Menu folder as user basis. One is the <CURRENT USER> Tray Menu folder and the another is <ALL USERS> Tray Menu folder. You can also access common folders (Ex. My Documents), Shared folders (Ex. Shared Documents) and special folders (Ex. Program Files) quickly by using the context menu of the MTC from notification area.
summary: This is a notification program with context menu.
